comment: Every survivor of Narcissistic Abuse recognizes each detail of this conversation. Many Doctors specialize in the treatment of PTSD in adults and children from Narcissistic Abuse. This case is textbook. When Mr. Depp says "I loved you for so many years, but you didn't exist. You don't exist, you're not there. You were a made up thing in my head." THAT is the moment that he realizes it is all a game. He has been played. Ms. Heard never "loved" him...because Narcissists don't know what "love" is. That moment is the moment that his heart breaks. It makes me sad..and angry. Ms. Heard has set women's rights back a hundred years. Now, if a woman dare come forward, she'll be pulling an "Amber Heard". Now we are back to disbelief before belief.  If you are in a situation like this, get to safety immediately. See a doctor, and see a specialist. The abuse you have suffered will have left tell-tale signs upon you. Let the experts guide you through the process. It's a crazy world out there, stay safe!
